features: The pack contains 5 folders, each presented in an elegantly curated vibrant hue, infusing a blend of sophistication and charm into your document storage.
Crafted from high-quality plastic, Mr. Pen file folders offer superior resistance to wear, tear, and moisture, ensuring your documents remain pristine and protected.
Designed with two spacious pockets and a trio of center prongs, these folders facilitate both loose and bound document storage, ensuring effortless organization and accessibility of papers.
With dimensions of 11.5" x 9.35", the folders are tailored to snugly accommodate standard-sized papers, guaranteeing a neat, tidy, and crease-free storage solution.

Ideal for a broad spectrum of users, from students organizing project materials to professionals presenting proposals, these folders cater to a wide range of paper management and presentation requirements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I love Mr. Pen products and these are no exception. I love these colors and I'm very happy that I ordered 2 packs!!!The binders are sturdy, durable and allow for multiple opening and closing of the prongs without breaking or losing strength.Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'll Definitely Order Again
reviews.reviewText: These folders are exactly what I needed and arrived the next day. The colors are amazingly gorgeous with a really nice sheen, and the folders are sturdy without being too rigid. The bonus for me was the little thank you cards and the mustache sticker. Kudos to this company for their customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Folders With Pockets And Prongs
reviews.reviewText: The pockets make these folders extra useful for keeping additional documents in them, and the prongs are perfect for securing hole-punched paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing customer service policy!
reviews.reviewText: I have not had to use it yet, but I am impressed with this company's advertised customer service policy! They say that if for any reason, at any point in time, if the customer is not satisfied, they will refund the money or exchange the product. That's pretty impressive!In terms of the product, I got a set of 5 plastic folders, as I was supposed to. They seem to be more durable so far than other plastic folders we've had, so I hope they last long! The colors are nice-- not the typical rainbow colors, but still nice. We are happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice selection of plastic folders / report covers
reviews.reviewText: I've always liked using thin report covers for storing smaller printouts, as they take up much less room on my desk than a typical 3-ring binder. These Mr. Pen plastic folders are a good addition to my collection.I appreciate the varied colors included (violet, gray, gold, blue/green, and a muted red to my eye), as it makes it easier to grab the right folder if I'm in a hurry. The construction is solid, and I expect these will last just as long as the reinforced paper folders I typically use. And I'm not sure I'll need the built-in pockets, but it is a handy feature to have. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value especially for the price.
reviews.reviewText: These Mr Pen plastic folders don't disappoint. They work great. They're made from lightweight very durable and resilient plastic material. These are so flexible that they won't crack like previous folders I've had.They're waterproof, tear proof and protect documents well. I like the subdued soft earthy colors. The inner pockets are large and securely hold paperwork, envelopes etc. The metal prongs are strong and easy to maneuver. Very pleased with this set of folders. The price is excellent. I would expect to pay much more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the colors!
reviews.reviewText: These are great to have in the office or around the house for paperwork. Grateful teachers to keep paperwork in. durable material that wipes off easily.
